title: Tax Regulations
summary: The official website of the Indonesian Directorate General of Taxes provides information on tax regulations, including overview, visi, misi, tujuan, dan maklumat pelayanan.
key_points: Overview of tax regulations in Indonesia.
Visi, misi, tujuan, dan maklumat pelayanan for the Directorate General of Taxes.
Struktur organisasi and daftar pejabat for the Directorate General of Taxes.
business_implications: Businesses operating in Indonesia should be aware of the tax regulations and ensure compliance to avoid penalties.
